item.title: End NV-487 North at US-6/US-50
item.description: End NV-487 North at US-6/US-50. NV-487 MP 11 (White Pine County).

item.title: End NV-487 North at US-6/US-50
item.description: End NV-487 North at US-6/US-50. Use US-6/US-50 West to Ely; US-6/US-50 East to Delta (Utah).

item.title: NV-487 North Approaching US-6/US-50
item.description: NV-487 North approaching US-6/US-50 in White Pine County.

item.title: End NV-488 East at NV-487
item.description: End NV-488 East at NV-487 in Baker. Use NV-487 south for Garrison (Utah). Use NV-487 north for Delta (Utah) and Ely.

item.title: NV-487 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-487 North. Distance to Baker and US-50/US-6 Junction.

item.title: Begin NV-487 North / Scenic Byway
item.description: Begin NV-487 North / Scenic Byway at the Nevada - Utah State Line.

item.title: NV-487 North - Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome To Nevada / Pacific Time Zone on NV-487 North.

item.title: US-6/US-50 West at NV-487 East
item.description: US-6/US-50 West at NV-487 East in White Pine County.

item.title: US-6/US-50 West at NV-487
item.description: US-6/US-50 West at NV-487 east to Baker and Garrison (Utah). Continue east on US-6/US-50 for Ely and Carson City (via US-50).

item.title: US-6/US-50 West Approaching NV-487
item.description: US-6/US-50 West approaching NV-487 in White Pine County.

item.title: NV-487 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-487 south. Distance to Gunnison, Milford, and Beaver. All three locations are located in Utah.

item.title: NV-487 South Approaching NV-488
item.description: NV-487 south approaching NV-488 in 500 Feet.

item.title: Begin NV-487 South
item.description: Begin NV-487 south in White Pine County. NV-487 is designated as a Nevada Scenic Byway for the entire length of the route.

item.title: US-6/US-50 East At NV-487
item.description: US-6/US-50 east approaching NV-487. Turn right for NV-487 south to Baker and Garrison (Utah). Continue east on US-6/US-50 for Hinkley (Utah) and Delta (Utah).

item.title: US-6/US-50 East Approaching NV-487
item.description: US-6/US-50 East approaching NV-487 in White Pine County.
